title: A sermon preached at St. Bartholomevvs the lesse in London, on the xxvii. day of March 1642; being the day of the inauguration of our soveraigne lord King Charles. By William Hall. Minister of that parish, and now thought fit to be published.
author: Hall, William, d. 1662.
publisher: Printed by T. Badger for Samuel Brown,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
